name: Super Tron 97
overview: Welcome to Super Tron 97 by S.O.S. This version is freeware. We hope you will enjoy the game. This version took 3 days to finish. In 1993, I Beast released Super Tron for Amiga at The Computer Cross Road in Göteborg. Your mission is avoid colliding with yourself, walls or opponent and make your opponent collide with your light cycle tail, walls, or other items. While early versions were a 1-2 player game. Amiga Version 1.2 is for 1-4 Players.
